pages.text: All machines in Beyond Earth require power/RF in order to function.It is best to use power sources/generators from other mods in order to reach energy requirements. $(br2) Under circumstances where no other power generation is available,Beyond Earth does provide with a some generators to satisfy energy needs.
Using coal as fuel, this machines generates 2FE/tick, however it requires a constant supply of coal to provide power
pages.title: Coal Generator

pages.text: A reliable and more effective source of power, the Solar panel generates 5FE/tick, although it is a passive source of energy, as all solar panels, this machine requies daylight to function
pages.title: Solar Panel
